text: The 1999 Italian Formula 3000 Championship was contested over 7 rounds. 16 different teams and 27 different drivers competed. In this one-make formula all teams had to utilize Lola T96/50 chassis with Zytek engines. ==Entries== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:85%" ! Team ! ! Driver !
